name: Frostbook
description:
Frostbook is an Undertale/Deltarune inspired 2D platformer.

Game jam theme: Decay -> your actions influence how the world is shaped. The more you kill the decay will help you kill more, eventually leading to destroying an entire hotel.

The game jam version features 2 fights which influences which of the  3 endings you'll get at the end of this chapter.

Compete on the in-game leaderboards! Your speedrun time is tracked while you played, and gets sent to the leaderboard when you finish your run.

Endings and good to know information:

  • Normal ending: 1 or 2 kills, no dagger
  • Love ending: no kills
  • Genocide ending: 2 kills + dagger

To end a fight peacefully, you need to reach 5 "love". Love can be gained by choosing the right reactions. Milk and the stick gives 3 love each.

Contains 2000+ lines of code (if you were curious)

Everything you see and hear in the game was made by a single person in 3 days.

Meow!
